com.JasonILTG.ScienceMod.gui.general

Class InventoryGUIContainer

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.minecraft.inventory.Container
      • com.JasonILTG.ScienceMod.gui.general.InventoryGUIContainer
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    GeneratorGUIContainer, JarLauncherGUIContainer, MachineGUIContainer

    public class InventoryGUIContainer
extends net.minecraft.inventory.Container
    Wrapper class for all Container classes for inventories in ScienceMod.
    Author:
    JasonILTG and syy1125
